function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of budget allocation for PCAs","Impact":"Reduction in conservation efforts and biodiversity protection","Mitigation":"Advocacy for increased budget allocation, integration of biodiversity-positive actions into other ministry plans and budgets","Technologies":"Budget management and advocacy tools","People":"Government officials, conservation organizations","Owner":"Government, conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate focus on job creation with biodiversity benefits","Impact":"Missed opportunity to support labour-intensive ecosystem restoration","Mitigation":"Design job creation programmes to bring about biodiversity benefits, focus on PCAs","Technologies":"Ecosystem restoration techniques, job creation guidelines","People":"Government officials, conservation organizations","Owner":"Government, conservation organizations"},{"Description":"Underutilization of nature-based solutions (NbS) for climate change mitigation and adaptation","Impact":"Missed opportunity to achieve climate change goals through NbS","Mitigation":"Promote use of NbS with real biodiversity benefits for climate change mitigation and adaptation","Technologies":"Nature-based solutions, biodiversity assessment tools","People":"Government officials, climate change organizations","Owner":"Government, climate change organizations"}]}
